note: Suicide deaths are underreported in many countries due to social stigma and cultural or legal concerns.
title: Share of suicides from pesticide poisoning
subtitle: Estimated share of deaths from suicide which resulted from pesticide poisoning. This is shown as the weighted-average globally and by region, and over the period 2010-2014.

display.name: Share of deaths from pesticide poisoning

sourceDesc: Mew et al. (2017). The global burden of fatal self-poisoning with pesticides 2006-15: systematic review.
